isis.stitle: 9 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-8609 SERIES - INSTALL - Air Lines and Air Filter/ Regulator

svcproc.title: Air Lines and Air Filter/ Regulator

note.para: Recommended sealant for fittings is Loctite 242.

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the slave valve and the HI Range port of the range cylinder. Tighten fittings securely ( Figure 239).

figure.caption: Figure 239. Connect Air Hose Between Slave Valve and HI Range Port

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the slave valve and the LO Range port of the range cylinder. Tighten fittings securely ( Figure 240).

figure.caption: Figure 240. Connect Air Hose Between Slave Valve and LO Range Port

step1.para: Position the air filter/regulator on the rear of the auxiliary housing and install the two retaining bolts. Tighten to 8 to 12 ft-lbs. (11 to 16 N•m) ( Figure 241).

figure.caption: Figure 241. Position Air Filter/Regulator on Rear of Auxiliary Housing and Install Retaining Bolts

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the slave valve and the air filter/regulator. Tighten fittings securely ( Figure 242).

figure.caption: Figure 242. Connect Air Hose Between Slave Valve and Air Filter/Regulator

step1.para: Position the air lines, valve cover and jam nut on the shift lever. Thread the Roadranger valve on the shift lever and secure by tightening the jam nut against the valve ( Figure 243).

figure.caption: Figure 243. Thread Roadranger Valve on Shift Lever and Secure by Tightening Jam Nut

step1.para: Connect the white air line to the "S" or Supply Port and the black air line to the "P" or End Port of the slave valve. Tighten fittings securely ( Figure 244).

figure.caption: Figure 244. Connect White Air Line to Supply Port of Slave Valve

step1.para: Connect the white air line to the "S" or Supply Port and the black air line to the "P" Port of the Roadranger valve. Tighten fittings securely ( Figure 245).

figure.caption: Figure 245. Connect White Air Line to Supply Port of Roadranger Valve

step1.para: Position the valve cover on the Roadranger valve and secure by tightening the two mounting screws in the cover ( Figure 246).

figure.caption: Figure 246. Position Valve Cover on Roadranger Valve and Secure
